mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE", BOARD_CATEGORY, COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE", BOARD_CATEGORY, USER_NO FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_WRITER, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE", USER_NO FROM REPLY WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
